title: S12 Ep167: The House of the Damned
itunes:title: The House of the Damned
description:
Charles Brandon lives in one of the most haunted houses in Brooklyn, New York. Charles claims that hundreds of ghosts (including a young girl named Kit) and even Lucifer himself not only haunt the place, but the house itself has been trying to tear Charles apart for the better part of seven years. And the interesting part of it is... he has it all documented on video!

Charles Brandon YouTube: https://t.co/csWHlWJvuO

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bklyn_haunting
